Thanks for downloading this torrent!
Here is the instructions HOW TO INSTALL .PACKAGE FILES!!!
Do the following:
1) Go to "Documents" folder,
2) Then, "Electronic Arts" folder,
3) Then, "The Sims 3" folder,
4) Then, "Mods" folder (if you don't have it, CREATE it and COPY Resource.cfg from the torrent there)
5) Then, "Packages" folder (if you don't have it, CREATE it and COPY inside all your .package files)
6) After that, reboot the game and here you go.
